title: MovieDine
description: A group project in which we attempted to create a page where one could search for streaming film and tv option and also find local restaurants.

title: Alientown
description: A group project in which we created an interactive and searchable database in mysql of UFO sightings.

title: Day Planner
description: A day planner in which each hour is color coded, relative to the current time.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: An interactive website that provides weather forecasts by city name using APIs.

title: Automated ReadMe Generator
description: A Javascript application designed to automate and streamline the process of creating ReadMe files for projects on Github.

title: MySQL Employee Tracker
description: This project is a MySQL database program designed to allow a manager to edit their employee database through the terminal console.
